docblock.long-description: This file is included in the init script and contains the main SC class and the main SC Library class.

parse_markers.error: Name of argument $call does not match with the DocBlock's name $view in load_ajax()
parse_markers.notice: Parameter $view could not be found in load_ajax()

docblock.long-description: The class includes loading methods for libraries and the ajax psuedo-views

This function loads a library into the main SC Object. If the library is already loaded, it is skipped. It will also load additional libraries specified by the "required_libraries" property of the library;

tag.name: param
tag.description: Either a string containing the library name or an array of strings containing multiple libraries to load.

docblock.long-description:
Each ajax call can consist of up to 2 files, a controller and a view. Just like any MVC the call should be split into logic and display.

After a controller is loaded, an optional function will be called that is named after the ajax call. This function will be passed any arguments provided by the URI. This function can return any data to be passed to the view as an assoc array, with the key being the name of the variable to passed. The function should belong to the "Ajax" namespace

Call files must be all lowercase. If the call doesn't exist a 404 page will be generated.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the ajax call. No extention

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of data to be sequentially passed to the ajax call's possible function call.

docblock.long-description: This class simply contains adds the $SC property to each library which allows access to the global $SC object
This is the initial checkout script that loads whatever the first screen the customer needs to be on

docblock.description: Processes the cart and displays it to the user for verification
Loads the gateway driver's payment area
Validates and processes updating the customer's account details
Adds an item to the users cart

docblock.long-description: Ajax Controller Function Adds an item to the current customers cart. Echos the "Item Added" flag or an alternate flag that alters the customer that there item couldn't quite be added the way they wanted it. Item number is passed via the URI. All other (variable) data is posted to the function.

docblock.description: Page that will generate and output the customer's receipt
This file defines any constants needed for Simplecart

docblock.long-description: This file must be included in any page where SC's display parsing needs to happen. It must be included before any output from the page.
This file must be included in any page where SC's display parsing needs to happen. It must be included before any output from the page.

This file the final destination of the data coming from the payment gateway. Payment drivers should be setup to translate data from the gateway result into here. The file expects the following post data:

**transaction* Transaction Number **hash* The security hash, containing the transaction number and the store's generated security key, seperated by a space and md5'd; **status_code* Boolean value of whether or not the transaction was a success **status_text* If the transaction was unsuccessful, why it was unsuccessful

This file the final destination of the data coming from the payment gateway. Payment drivers should be setup to translate data from the gateway result into here. The file expects the following post data:

**transaction* Transaction Number **hash* The security hash, containing the transaction number and the store's generated security key, seperated by a space and md5'd; **status_code* Boolean value of whether or not the transaction was a success **status_text* If the transaction was unsuccessful, why it was unsuccessful
